EmailTemplate.name: 2018_EMEAI_Connectivity_DubaiEvent_KKO.2018_EMEAI_Confirmation_Connectivity_Jedd
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Connectivity Conference in Dubai, UAE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Dubai, UAE. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Connectivity Conference Date: Wednesday, November 28, 2018 Time: 8:30 a.m. - 3 p.m. Location: DUBAI
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
